lead_paragraph: Russia's exclusion from next month's Paralympic Games in Rio is a different situation from the IOC's decision to allow some Russian competitors to take part at the Olympics, International Olympic Committee President Thomas Bach said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Paralympics Ban for Russia Different From IOC Decision: Bach
headline.main: Paralympics Ban for Russia Different From IOC Decision: Bach
